name: Fire Dog
description: Fire Dog; Attributed to Pierre Gouthière (French, 1732 - 1813/1814, master 1758); Paris, France; about 1775; Gilt bronze; dark blue enamel panels; 40 x 38.1 x 14 cm (15 3/4 x 15 x 5 1/2 in.); 62.DF.1.2; Gift of J. Paul Getty; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Fire Dog
medium: Gilt bronze; dark blue enamel panels
